document_data.name: Arglander River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Arglander River''' was one of the major sources of the [[Deepwash]].
document_data.Geography: The river was located within [[Ahlarkhem|Ahlarkhem Barony]] in [[Erlkazar]]. It flowed down from the tallest of the [[High Peaks]] of the [[Cloven Mountains]] into the Deepwash. The river had many cascades and rapids, making it extremely difficult to cross. The only exception was at the [[Shadebridge]].
